InitialSkirmish.contractMessage: Time to get this party started, Commander. We're going in with a simple combat operation. Buckle up, it only gets hotter from here.

CapturingTheBase.contractMessage: Ok, Commander, we've got our LZ, now it's time to capture an enemy base to set up our command post. Expect resistance.

HoldingTheBase.contractMessage: Commander, we've received word from our advance scouts of a large enemy counter-attack against our command post. Get out there and hold the line!

CrushingResistance.contractMessage: We've identified the source of the recent counter-attack that you held off. Time to break their assault once and for all. Destroy that base, Commander.

PaymentDelivered.popupMessage: Looks like {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} has delivered our payment, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Looks pretty comphrensive, Darius is already compiling a report for you.
